full_summary:
### Solicitation for Encrypted Portable USB-A Drives

**Solicited By:** [Shared Services Canada](https://www sharedservicescanada.ca)
**Department:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police
**Notification Period:** 15 days (13 January 2023 to 27 January 2023)
**Solicited Items:** Encrypted portable USB-A drives and related services
**Delivery Location:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Summary of Requirement:** 

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking Encrypted Portable USB-A Drives to safeguard sensitive information. The solicited items include 420 units of encrypted portable USB-A drives with the option to purchase additional quantities. The RCMP seeks a reliable supplier to provide these devices with a delivery date of 60 federal government working days after contract award or by 31 March 2023, whichever is sooner.

**Security Requirements:** 

There are no specific security requirements detailed in this solicitation.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA):** 

The RCMP has recognized the need to comply with Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements. However, this solicitation does not specifically address any CLCA requirements.

**Accessing the Solicitation:**

The solicitation can be accessed and bids submitted through the Shared Services Canada Supplier Portal at: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

**Submission Language:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, English or French.

**Contact Information:** 

For any inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact:
Alyssa Brook, Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, 6th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P2H8, Canada
Email: [alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Tele: 343-548-0159

**Notice URL:**

There is no notice URL provided.

**Attachments:** 

Please refer to the solicitation documents for a detailed list of attachments.
